Name: Starbolt
Description: Starbolt is a member of the Shi'ar Imperial Guard.
FirstComicDescription: After being transported through a star-gate by Phoenix, the X-Men find themselves on an ancient planet that is home to the M'Kraan Crystal, surrounded by several members of the Shi'ar Imperial Guard serving the evil Emperor D'Ken.
